# AiVerse - Complete AI Creative Platform Documentation
# Extended version for LLM context

## Platform Overview

AiVerse is a comprehensive AI-powered creative platform that democratizes access to cutting-edge artificial intelligence tools. Our mission is to empower creators of all skill levels to produce professional-quality content using the latest AI technologies.

### What Makes AiVerse Unique

1. **Multi-Model Approach**: We aggregate the best AI models from various providers, giving users access to FLUX, GPT-4, Claude, Seedance, Kling, and more through a single unified interface.

2. **Telegram Integration**: Native Telegram Mini App experience allows users to create AI content directly within their messaging app, making AI accessible without additional downloads.

3. **Web Platform**: Full-featured web application at https://www.aiverseapp.net for desktop users requiring more screen space for creative work.

4. **Gamification**: Unique reward system with daily bonuses, spins, and referral rewards keeps users engaged while creating.

## Detailed Feature Breakdown

### Image Generation Capabilities

AiVerse supports multiple state-of-the-art image generation models:

- **FLUX**: Fast, high-quality image generation with excellent prompt adherence
- **GPT-Image**: OpenAI's DALL-E powered image creation
- **Stable Diffusion XL**: Open-source powerhouse for detailed imagery
- **Midjourney-style**: Artistic and creative image outputs

**Supported Parameters:**
- Resolution: Up to 4K (4096x4096 pixels)
- Aspect ratios: 1:1, 16:9, 9:16, 4:3, 3:4
- Style presets: Photorealistic, Anime, Digital Art, Oil Painting, etc.
- Negative prompts for refined control

### Video Generation Capabilities

Create AI videos with our cutting-edge video models:

- **Seedance**: Text-to-video and image-to-video generation
- **Kling AI**: High-quality video synthesis
- **Custom models**: Continuously adding new video AI capabilities

**Video Features:**
- Duration: 3-10 seconds
- Resolution: Up to 1080p
- Frame rates: 24-30 FPS
- Input modes: Text-to-video, Image-to-video

### AI Chat System

Intelligent conversational AI for various use cases:

- **GPT-4 Turbo**: OpenAI's most capable model
- **Claude 3**: Anthropic's helpful AI assistant
- **DeepSeek**: Cost-effective alternative for general queries

**Chat Features:**
- Context memory within conversations
- Multi-turn dialogue support
- Code generation and explanation
- Creative writing assistance
- Translation and language learning

## User Journey

### New User Flow
1. Access via Telegram bot @aiversebot or website https://www.aiverseapp.net
2. Automatic account creation with referral tracking
3. Receive welcome bonus coins
4. Explore Studio for image/video generation
5. Engage with daily bonuses and community features

### Premium Features
- Increased generation limits
- Priority queue processing
- Access to premium AI models
- Extended video duration
- Higher resolution outputs

## Technical Architecture

### Platform Components
- **Frontend**: React-based SPA with TypeScript
- **Telegram Integration**: Telegram Mini Apps SDK
- **Authentication**: Telegram OAuth + Google OAuth for web
- **Backend**: Node.js/Express API
- **Database**: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- **AI Providers**: Multiple AI service integrations

### Supported Languages
- English (en)
- Russian (ru)
- Spanish (es)
- French (fr)
- German (de)
- Arabic (ar)

## Business Information

### Company Details
- **Product Name**: AiVerse
- **Domain**: aiverseapp.net
- **Category**: AI/ML, Creative Tools, SaaS
- **Target Audience**: Content creators, social media managers, artists, developers

### Contact Information
- **General Inquiries**: contact@aiverseapp.net
- **Telegram Bot**: @aiversebot
- **Support**: Available through Telegram bot

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is AiVerse free to use?**
A: AiVerse offers a freemium model with daily free generations. Premium subscriptions unlock additional features and limits.

**Q: What AI models does AiVerse support?**
A: We support FLUX, GPT-4, GPT-Image, Claude, DeepSeek, Seedance, Kling, and more models are continuously being added.

**Q: Can I use AiVerse without Telegram?**
A: Yes! Access the full web platform at https://www.aiverseapp.net with Google login.

**Q: Is my data secure?**
A: We follow industry-standard security practices. See our Privacy Policy at https://www.aiverseapp.net/privacy.

**Q: How do referrals work?**
A: Share your unique referral link. When friends join and make generations, both of you earn bonus coins.

## Sitemap

- Homepage: https://www.aiverseapp.net/
- Login: https://www.aiverseapp.net/login
- Studio (requires auth): https://www.aiverseapp.net/studio
- Privacy Policy: https://www.aiverseapp.net/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://www.aiverseapp.net/terms
